segments.text: Excuse me , Sir , do you know what time it is ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , it ’ s almost eleven twenty .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You ’ re welcome . The rain is quite heavy , isn ’ t it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah . I was in a hurry and I forgot my umbrella today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have one . We could share it . Which way are you going ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , that ’ s very kind of you . I am going to the Garden Hotel .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am going there , too . We can walk together .
segments.speaker: S2
